topics.body:
I just retorted a person's argument through Youtube comments about the idea of gay.

Though, I didn't go all batshit crazy while abusing my capslock and start screaming shit without any evidence or constructive arguments. I fought like a civilized man and now I'm waiting whether he would change his mind, give up the argument or just ignore me completely.
In either case means I win.

Unless he adds another argument _but_ if he adds anything about religion or babies, I win because I already retorted that earlier.

!http://media0.giphy.com/media/13p77tfexyLtx6/giphy.gif!
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bcda2a6368722fc9751000#post_54bcda2a6368722fc9751000
